Your tactics are legendary for their devastating nature.

Alternative Reward: Glory Boon - Uncommon

Properties:

  • You gain a +1 item bonus to Intimidate checks. Level 14: +3 item bonus. Level 24: +5 item bonus.
  • Rather than drawing a Fortune Card at the start of an encounter, you can choose one attack card from your deck and start the encounter with that card in your hand. After removing the card, reshuffle your deck.

Trigger: You draw a Fortune Card from the defense or tactics category.

Effect: You discard the card and draw cards until you get an attack card, discarding all non-attack cards.
